credits.question: What are credits used for?
credits.answer: Credits let you generate new stories. Each story costs 1 credit. Premium subscribers also get monthly credits automatically.

subscription.question: How do subscriptions work?
subscription.answer: Subscriptions provide credits each month automatically and give you access to premium features. Monthly subscribers get 20 credits/month, while annual subscribers get 30 credits/month.

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

refund.question: Can I get a refund?
refund.answer: We offer refunds within 7 days of purchase if you haven't used any credits. Contact our support team for assistance.
